amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that employees who lose their overtime protection as a result of the bill would have a right to choose whether or not to work overtime.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the employee's consent to work any hours in excess of forty in any workweek or eight hours in any day.

action.text: On agreeing to the Owens amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 246 (Roll No. 227).
